name: Leisure Town
description: First person game. Let me enter the story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3.70GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA@ GeForce@ GTX 460 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space
